titleStmt.title: A. H. Landis to James F. Robinson
CWG7691

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Millville Ohio Sept 6th 1862
Hon J. F. Robinsin
Dear Sir.

I would like to have the post of Surgeon in one of the Kentucky Regiments. I was before the Ohio State Board of Medical examiners at their last session and they recommended me for Surgeon. If you need my services they are at your disposal.
